content: I see bug!, delay_span_bug!, delay_span_err! etc and I don't really understand what does what. Is there an explanation of these macros somewhere? The diagnostics page of rustc dev guide seems to give an introduction but the delay variants and bug! isn't covered there.
I don't know about the other two, but I think bug! is just an alias for panic!
Actually, it looks like in some cases it's just an alias for panic!, but it has other logic too.
